title: Video: Factory Floor – Two Different Ways
content:
So Factory Floor just casually blew my tiny mind.

Their new video looks like a PBS spot on Bill Cosby’s soul through the eyes of Kenneth Anger, but still riffing on that Neu!-via-New Order disco tip. These guys present themselves as ‘post-industrial’, which is an awfully glum way to go, but there’s more deadpan techno playfulness ahead by the looks of things. Knees crossed they keep the tempo at a set pace.

Heck, I’m not gonna say much else cause the vid pretty much sums itself up. I must say though, dude is bustin’ some intense Carlton moves (braving seductive and serious?). Which ever so slightly puts these lil legs to shame…

Watch the video for Two Different Ways below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d10
